channel.title: Veasy on Flavien Jaquerod
channel.description: Recent content in Veasy on Flavien Jaquerod

item.title: TrueSecrets
item.description: this challenge makes us go through a .raw file containing all the content of a windows file system at some point. Checking the processes and applications, we see TrueCrypt file that we can use to retrieve content and break AES encryption to get the flag

item.title: Weather app
item.description: HTB writeup for the easy web challenge “Weather app” which uses a combination of request smuggling, sql injection and ssrf vulnerability to get the flag. Pretty advanced compared to other web challenges.

item.title: Alien cradle
item.description: A concise walkthrough of the very easy Hack The Box challenge “Alien cradle”.

item.title: Candy Vault
item.description: A concise walkthrough of the very easy Hack The Box challenge “Candy vault”. Use
